title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Kyrie Irving's future and why it could make perfect sense for him to reunited with LeBron James. He believes the Browns continue to create problems for themselves by operating out of fear and desperation. He also tells you why he was right about Steph Curry and wrong about Jaylen Brown. Plus, Ryen Russillo from The Ringer joins the show to explain why Steph Curry greatness can't be questioned anymore. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
